dc.title: Structural Biology Center | Argonne National Laboratory
dc.description: The Structural Biology Center (SBC) operates a national user facility for macromolecular crystallography at Sector 19 of the Advanced Photon Source at Argonne National Laboratory. The SBC makes available to scientific community two experimental stations: an insertion-device, 19ID, and a bending-magnet, 19BM and a biochemistry laboratory.
